posts.post_content:
Recently did some upgrades and/or have some dupes available for sale or trade.  Couple of these are more difficult to come by.

Looking for additional EPDG's I need or upgrades/downgrades to what I already have.  

Will entertain any/all offers.  If buying, Paypal friends is preferred. Will also accept money orders.  Anyone saying "I'll take it" gets priority over ongoing negotiations. 


$SOLD Doolin portrait 
$SOLD Seymour batting "5 corner"
$SOLD Maddox 
$SOLD Keeler portrait
$SOLD Phillippe 
$TRADEDOakes 
$SOLD Tannehill PSA 1mk
$SOLD Titus
$SOLD Spade PSA 1.5 
$SOLD Hofman
